function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity and interaction between individuals in the streets","Impact":"High risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing measures, wearing masks, and reducing public gatherings","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, and air purifiers","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Attentiveness to non-human others and the more-than-human city","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic disease transmission and ecological disruptions","Mitigation":"Protecting wildlife habitats, monitoring zoonotic diseases, and promoting responsible interaction with wildlife","Technologies":"Wildlife tracking devices, ecological monitoring systems","People":"Environmental organizations, wildlife conservation groups","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local governments"},{"Description":"Familiarity with lockdown measures leading to complacency","Impact":"Reduced adherence to public health guidelines and increased risk of virus spread","Mitigation":"Continuous public health education, emergency preparedness drills, and community engagement","Technologies":"Emergency alert systems, digital communication platforms","People":"Local residents","Owner":"Community leaders, public health authorities"}]}
